title: Story 1
description: The team needs to finalize updates on the fraud detection model by June 3rd, with a focus on improving recall among new car holders under 30 and reducing false positives. Additionally, they must provide full support for a new credit limit model by July 1st, including documentation that is audit-ready.

title: Story 2
description: The meeting requires the analysts to be ready by Tuesday about June 3rd, Justin's pipeline update might introduce noise to be validated by April, and David should retrain the income estimation model, which is currently over two weeks but will be finished by tomorrow evening with results sent by Wednesday. Priya needs a new business request for a simplified three-tier risk model for instant approvals by June 6th.

title: Story 3
description: Description: Update the fraud detection model by analyzing false positives on Tuesday around June 3rd; finalize documentation for CFPV explainability rules by next Thursday; retrain income estimation model within two weeks and send results by Wednesday; scope out changes to three-tier risk model for instant approvals by June 6th.

title: Story 4
description: We need to perform the following tasks by specific deadlines: - Validate distributions by segment by April (already in progress). - Finalize shaft dashboard and documentation for new CFPV explainability rules, which is due next Thursday. - Review model docs, flagging anything that needs polishing by June 7th. - Involves legal team before the end of June to ensure proper explanation of decisions. - Retrain income estimation model within two weeks. - Launch pipeline after today's call and compare pre and post accuracy results by Wednesday. - Define preliminary cutoffs for simplified three-tier risk model for instant approvals, proposing new structure by June 6th.

title: Story 5
description: Description: Review the fraud detection model recall, ensure analysts are ready by Tuesday; update on new CFPV explainability rules requiring full support and audit-ready documentation by July 1st; retrain the income estimation model to complete by tomorrow evening with accuracy comparison results sent by Wednesday; and scope out changes for a simplified three-tier risk model for Priya's new business request, proposing updates by June 6th.

title: Story 6
description: Description: Review the fraud detection model update by June 3rd, finalize credit limit model documentation by July 1st, retrain income estimation model within two weeks, propose new three-tier risk model for Priya's business request by June 6th, and reconvene on June 5th at 10 p.m.

title: Story 7
description: The team needs to finalize the credit limit model documentation by mid-June, launch the income estimation model retraining pipeline by tomorrow evening, and propose changes to the three-tier risk model for instant approvals by June 6th, with a review by legal and validation by Michael before the end of June.

title: Story 8
description: The team needs to finalize the credit limit model documentation by July 1st, complete the income estimation model retraining by the end of next week and send results by Wednesday, simplify the three-tier risk model for instant approvals with proposed new structure by June 6th, and reconvene on June 5th at 10 p.m.

title: Story 9
description: Describe the key actions and deadlines for Story 9: - Validate distribution by segment by April - Prepare analysts for June 3rd, with documentation due Tuesday - Finalize credit limit model documentation by July 7th - Involvement of legal team on or before June 30th - Retrain income estimation model starting today and send results by Wednesday - Define new business request for Priya by June 6th

title: Story 10
description: Meet with analysts by Tuesday about June 3rd, including deep dive on false positives and distribution validation. Finalize documentation for new CFPV explainability rules by July 1st, ensuring audit-ready support. Launch retraining pipeline for income estimation model by end of call, compare pre- and post-accuracy results by Wednesday, and propose new three-tier risk model for Priya's business request by June 6th.
